        @Deprecated
public static final Setting<ByteSizeValue> SETTING_HTTP_NETTY_RECEIVE_PREDICTOR_MIN
        已过时。
        This (undocumented) setting is deprecated to reduce complexity and is removed in 7.0. See #26165 for details.
